languages.text: "Так Вигдис все же прослушивает мою {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс-линию{/g}..." {n}Джай криво ухмыляется и пожимает плечами.{/n} "Не угрожала я вашему {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Навигатору{/g}, и в мыслях не было. Я просто отдыхала — в хорошей компании из ароматного {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}амасека{/g}, душистого лхо и нескольких новых приятелей с верхних палуб... И тут в самый разгар веселья к нам залетает Леди-Навигатор и с порога несет что-то о том, что у нее раскалывается голова от пестрых всплесков из нашей каюты".

traits.locale_text: "Так Вигдис все же прослушивает мою {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс-линию{/g}..." {n}Джай криво ухмыляется и пожимает плечами.{/n} "Не угрожала я вашему {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Навигатору{/g}, и в мыслях не было. Я просто отдыхала — в хорошей компании из ароматного {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}амасека{/g}, душистого лхо и нескольких новых приятелей с верхних палуб... И тут в самый разгар веселья к нам залетает Леди-Навигатор и с порога несет что-то о том, что у нее раскалывается голова от пестрых всплесков из нашей каюты".
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "So Vigdis is snooping in on my {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-line{/g}..." {n}Jae grins crookedly and shrugs.{/n} "I wasn't threatening your {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, I didn't even think about it. I was just relaxing in the good company of fragrant {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}, sweet-scented lho, and a handful of new friends from the upper decks... And right in the middle of the fun, the Lady Navigator swoops in and starts jabbering about how her head is about to split from the 'cacophony of colours' coming from our cabin."
languages.original_text: "Так Вигдис все же прослушивает мою {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}вокс-линию{/g}..." {n}Джай криво ухмыляется и пожимает плечами.{/n} "Не угрожала я вашему {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Навигатору{/g}, и в мыслях не было. Я просто отдыхала — в хорошей компании из ароматного {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}амасека{/g}, душистого лхо и нескольких новых приятелей с верхних палуб... И тут в самый разгар веселья к нам залетает Леди-Навигатор и с порога несет что-то о том, что у нее раскалывается голова от пестрых всплесков из нашей каюты".

traits.locale_text: "So Vigdis is snooping in on my comm-line..." {n}Jae grins crookedly and shrugs.{/n} "I wasn't threatening your navigator, didn't even think about it. I was just relaxing in good company of fragrant amasec, sweet-scented lho and a handful of new friends from the upper decks... And right in the middle of the fun Lady Navigator swoops in and starts jabbering her head is about to split from the motley splashes coming from our cabin."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

I was just relaxing in the good company of fragrant {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}, sweet-scented lho, and a handful of new friends from the upper decks... And right in the middle of the fun, the Lady Navigator swoops in and starts jabbering about how her head is about to split from the 'cacophony of colours' coming from our cabin."

languages.text: “原来维格迪斯一直都在监视着我的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵线路{/g}……”{n}婕伊歪着嘴笑了笑，耸了耸肩。{/n}“我并没有威胁过你的{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}导航者{/g}，甚至根本没有考虑过这种事情。当时，我仅仅是准备放松一下。我准备好了芬芳的{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}艾玛赛克酒{/g}、香甜的麻烟，还邀请了几位来自上层甲板的新朋友……正当我们喜笑颜开的时候，导航者女士突然冲了进来，说我们的船舱里散发着‘无数光怪陆离的颜色’，说她的头都要裂了。”
languages.original_text: "So Vigdis is snooping in on my {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-line{/g}..." {n}Jae grins crookedly and shrugs.{/n} "I wasn't threatening your {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, I didn't even think about it. I was just relaxing in the good company of fragrant {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}, sweet-scented lho, and a handful of new friends from the upper decks... And right in the middle of the fun, the Lady Navigator swoops in and starts jabbering about how her head is about to split from the 'cacophony of colours' coming from our cabin."

traits.locale_text: “原来维格迪斯一直都在监视着我的{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵线路{/g}……”{n}婕伊歪着嘴笑了笑，耸了耸肩。{/n}“我并没有威胁过你的导航者，甚至根本没有考虑过这种事情。当时，我仅仅是准备放松一下。我准备好了芬芳的{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}艾玛赛克酒{/g}、香甜的麻烟，还邀请了几位来自上层甲板的新朋友……正当我们喜笑颜开的时候，导航者女士突然冲了进来，说我们的船舱里散发着‘无数光怪陆离的颜色’，说她的头都要裂了。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "So Vigdis is snooping in on my vox-line..." {n}Jae grins crookedly and shrugs.{/n} "I wasn't threatening your Navigator, didn't even think about it. I was just relaxing in the good company of fragrant amasec, sweet-scented lho, and a handful of new friends from the upper decks... And right in the middle of the fun, the Lady Navigator swoops in and starts jabbering about how her head is about to split from the 'cacophony of colours' coming from our cabin."

languages.text: «De modo que Vigdis está cotilleando en mi {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}línea de voco{/g}...». {n}Jae esboza una sonrisa retorcida y se encoge de hombros.{/n} «No estaba amenazando a su {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navegante{/g}; ni se me pasaría por la cabeza. Es que estaba relajándome en la buena compañía de un fragante {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}, un lho de aroma dulce, y un puñado de nuevos amigos de las cubiertas superiores... Y, justo cuando nos estábamos divirtiendo, apareció la lady Navegante para quejarse de que su cabeza va a explotar por la "cacofonía de colores" que surge de nuestro camarote».
languages.original_text: "So Vigdis is snooping in on my {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-line{/g}..." {n}Jae grins crookedly and shrugs.{/n} "I wasn't threatening your {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, I didn't even think about it. I was just relaxing in the good company of fragrant {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}, sweet-scented lho, and a handful of new friends from the upper decks... And right in the middle of the fun, the Lady Navigator swoops in and starts jabbering about how her head is about to split from the 'cacophony of colours' coming from our cabin."

traits.locale_text: «De modo que Vigdis está cotilleando en mi {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}línea de voco{/g}...». {n}Jae esboza una sonrisa retorcida y se encoge de hombros.{/n} «No estaba amenazando a su Navegante; ni se me pasaría por la cabeza. Es que estaba relajándome en la buena compañía de un fragante {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}, un lho de aroma dulce, y un puñado de nuevos amigos de las cubiertas superiores... Y, justo cuando nos estábamos divirtiendo, apareció la lady Navegante para quejarse de que su cabeza va a explotar por la "cacofonía de colores" que surge de nuestro camarote».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「それでヴィグディスがあたしの{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクスライン{/g}を覗き見しているってわけね…」{n}ジェイは歪んだ笑みを浮かべ、肩をすくめる。{/n}「あなたの{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}を脅していたわけじゃないのよ。考えなかったってわけでもないけどね。あたしはただ、香りのいい{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}アマセック{/g}、甘い香りのエルホ、そして上甲板の新しい友人たちとくつろいでいただけなの。その最中にカシアちゃんがやってきて、あたしたちのキャビンから聞こえる『色の不協和音』とやらで頭が割れそうだってお話しし始めたのよ」
languages.original_text: "So Vigdis is snooping in on my {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-line{/g}..." {n}Jae grins crookedly and shrugs.{/n} "I wasn't threatening your {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, I didn't even think about it. I was just relaxing in the good company of fragrant {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}, sweet-scented lho, and a handful of new friends from the upper decks... And right in the middle of the fun, the Lady Navigator swoops in and starts jabbering about how her head is about to split from the 'cacophony of colours' coming from our cabin."

traits.locale_text: 「それでヴィグディスがあたしの{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクスライン{/g}を覗き見しているってわけね…」{n}ジェイは歪んだ笑みを浮かべ、肩をすくめる。{/n}「あなたの{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}航宙士{/g}を脅していたわけじゃないのよ。考えなかったってわけでもないけどね。あたしはただ、香りのいい{g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}アマセック{/g}、甘い香りのエルホ、そして上甲板の新しい友人たちとくつろいでいただけなの。その最中にカシアちゃんがやってきて、あたしたちのキャビンから聞こえる『色の不協和音』とやらで頭が割れそうだってお話しし始めたのよ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Vigdis schnüffelt also in meiner {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox-Leitung{/g} herum ..." {n}Jae grinst schief und zuckt mit den Schultern.{/n} "Ich habe Eure {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigatorin{/g} nicht bedroht, das wäre mir nie in den Sinn gekommen. Ich habe mich nur in der guten Gesellschaft eines duftenden {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}Amasec{/g}, eines süßen Lho und einiger neuer Freunde von den oberen Decks entspannt ... Und mittendrin taucht die Navigatorin auf und brabbelt irgendwas davon, dass ihr durch die 'Kakophonie von Farben', die aus unserer Kabine kommt, bald der Kopf platzt."
languages.original_text: "So Vigdis is snooping in on my {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-line{/g}..." {n}Jae grins crookedly and shrugs.{/n} "I wasn't threatening your {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, I didn't even think about it. I was just relaxing in the good company of fragrant {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}, sweet-scented lho, and a handful of new friends from the upper decks... And right in the middle of the fun, the Lady Navigator swoops in and starts jabbering about how her head is about to split from the 'cacophony of colours' coming from our cabin."

traits.locale_text: "Vigdis schnüffelt also in meiner {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox-Leitung{/g} herum ..." {n}Jae grinst schief und zuckt mit den Schultern.{/n} "Ich habe Eure Navigatorin nicht bedroht, das wäre mir nie in den Sinn gekommen. Ich habe mich nur in der guten Gesellschaft eines duftenden {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}Amasec{/g}, eines süßen Lho und einiger neuer Freunde von den oberen Decks entspannt ... Und mittendrin taucht die Navigatorin auf und brabbelt irgendwas davon, dass ihr durch die 'Kakophonie von Farben', die aus unserer Kabine kommt, bald der Kopf platzt."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « J'en déduis que Vigdis espionne ma {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ligne-vox{/g}... » {n}Jae fait un sourire en coin et hausse les épaules.{/n} « Non, je n'ai pas menacé votre {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}navigatrice{/g}. Honnêtement, ça ne m'est même pas venu à l'esprit. Je ne faisais que me détendre en compagnie de quelques nouveaux amis des ponts supérieurs, avec qui je partageais un {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} exquis et du lho au parfum sucré... Soudain, cette chère navigatrice a fait irruption en racontant que sa tête allait exploser à cause de la "cacophonie de couleurs" qui émanait de notre cabine. »
languages.original_text: "So Vigdis is snooping in on my {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-line{/g}..." {n}Jae grins crookedly and shrugs.{/n} "I wasn't threatening your {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, I didn't even think about it. I was just relaxing in the good company of fragrant {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}, sweet-scented lho, and a handful of new friends from the upper decks... And right in the middle of the fun, the Lady Navigator swoops in and starts jabbering about how her head is about to split from the 'cacophony of colours' coming from our cabin."

traits.locale_text: « J'en déduis que Vigdis espionne ma {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ligne-vox{/g}... » {n}Jae fait un sourire en coin et hausse les épaules.{/n} « Non, je n'ai pas menacé votre navigatrice. Honnêtement, ça ne m'est même pas venu à l'esprit. Je ne faisais que me détendre en compagnie de quelques nouveaux amis des ponts supérieurs, avec qui je partageais un {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g} exquis et du lho au parfum sucré... Soudain, cette chère navigatrice a fait irruption en racontant que sa tête allait exploser à cause de la "cacophonie de couleurs" qui émanait de notre cabine. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Vigdis, {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks hattımı{/g} dinliyor demek." {n}Jae, çarpık bir şekilde gülümseyip omuz silkiyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacını{/g} tehdit etmedim, bu aklıma bile gelmedi. Nefis bir {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasek{/g}, mis kokulu bir miktar liho ve üst güvertelerden birkaç arkadaş eşliğinde rahatlayıp keyfime bakıyordum. Leydi Rotacı, cümbüşümün ortasına dalıp başının kabinimizden gelen 'renk kakofonisi' yüzünden çatlayacağını söyledi, ileri geri konuşmaya başladı."
languages.original_text: "So Vigdis is snooping in on my {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-line{/g}..." {n}Jae grins crookedly and shrugs.{/n} "I wasn't threatening your {g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Navigator{/g}, I didn't even think about it. I was just relaxing in the good company of fragrant {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasec{/g}, sweet-scented lho, and a handful of new friends from the upper decks... And right in the middle of the fun, the Lady Navigator swoops in and starts jabbering about how her head is about to split from the 'cacophony of colours' coming from our cabin."

traits.locale_text: "Demek Vigdis {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}voks hattı{/g}mı dinliyor." {n}Jae çarpık bir şekilde gülümseyip omuz silkiyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:Navigator}Rotacı{/g}'nı tehdit etmedim, bu aklımdan bile geçmedi. Yalnızca nefis bir {g|Encyclopedia:Amasec}amasek{/g}, mis kokulu bir miktar liho ve üst güvertelerden birkaç arkadaş eşliğinde rahatlayıp keyfime bakıyordum. Leydi Rotacı eğlencemin tam ortasına dalıp, başının kabinimizden gelen 'renk kakofonisi' yüzünden çatlayacağını söyleyerek ileri geri konuşmaya başladı."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
